channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: Open topic discussion on anything within a few degrees of Eon.

item.title: DEAD???
item.author: invalid@example.com (leper messiah)
item.dc:creator: leper messiah
item.content:encoded: r u guys dead or is this just a long time between updates

item.title: 1 year of silence
item.author: invalid@example.com ([DT-P]Zombie Hendrix)
item.dc:creator: [DT-P]Zombie Hendrix
item.content:encoded: One Year with no word from the developers...sadness becomes me

item.title: The Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (iddQd)
item.dc:creator: iddQd
item.content:encoded: Comedy post of evil inactivity!

item.title: Hello folks...
item.author: invalid@example.com (e3_Jeb)
item.dc:creator: e3_Jeb
item.content:encoded:
Hello Corona Leonis and Eon Community,

I'm a young mapper looking for a possible side project from my work, at a small console developer, as we're waiting for our next project. I've been following this project since August of last year and it is undoubtedly the most stellar work being done in unreal engine to date. I was hoping I might be able to help you out with some mapping (I remember a request before on the Atari Forums). I would have just started in secrecy and then sprung some work...

Hello folks...

item.title: Plans
item.author: invalid@example.com (deadeye fox)
item.dc:creator: deadeye fox
item.content:encoded: I was wondering what is the direction you want to take this game/mod? Like game modes, is there going to be a class system, mainly multiplayer ... that kinda stuff.

item.title: Eon still alive?
item.author: invalid@example.com ([DT-P]Zombie Hendrix)
item.dc:creator: [DT-P]Zombie Hendrix
item.content:encoded: I general dont like posts asking about development process. But its been almost 4 months since I've seen any new info on this site...don't tell me Eon is dead, it was brilliant idea with wonderful art direction.

item.title: New here
item.author: invalid@example.com (RyanW)
item.dc:creator: RyanW
item.content:encoded:
Hello guys,

My name is Ryan (as you can tell from the nick). I came across this website and I must say i am impressed with the pictures that i saw. I hope this game gets released since your doing it in your spare time. I am still unclear of the concept of the game, or should i say the goal/point. What do you do? This game lookings very promising which is why i decided to register here and join what looks like the early stages of this next generation game. I am a programmer myself so I...

New here

item.title: Website problems
item.author: invalid@example.com (Samurai)
item.dc:creator: Samurai
item.content:encoded:
Greetings you dude,

Unfortunately our web server died on us and all of the stuff we had up online went down in flames. That means our websites are down, and all of the work files we kept online have disappeared.

Those of you who visit our website (all both of you) may think that Eon is dead, and coupled with the lack of recent updates, you may have taken down your shrines and stopped wearing your fan-made Eon pyjama hats (y'know, like Link wears?). Have no fear. Eon lives. Of course...

Website problems

item.title: Server Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (Tetraden)
item.dc:creator: Tetraden
item.content:encoded:
OK, I am new and want to test the Game
I will TRY to open a Server on November the 24th at 19:00 O clock GMT.
BE WARNED, its a listening Server in Germany with an 2000 Kb/s ADSL Connection.
CU tomorrow and lets hope for a good Ping.

item.title: hey
item.author: invalid@example.com (Matt_22)
item.dc:creator: Matt_22
item.content:encoded: Hi, i'm new here, but i'd just like to wish the developers of this mod good luck, it looks like it has so much potential. I'll be keeping a close watch on this mod, as i'm sure many others are too who haven't signed up to the forums!

item.title: MSUC?
item.author: invalid@example.com (C3rb3ruz)
item.dc:creator: C3rb3ruz
item.content:encoded:
Will there be a version taking part in the Finals?
And will that version be available to puplic pleasure?

item.title: PC Gamer Coverage
item.author: invalid@example.com (Samurai)
item.dc:creator: Samurai
item.content:encoded:
Heeeyyy there,

We tricked PC Gamer into covering us for 2 weeks straight on their website. Go and check it out at www.pcgamer.com. Much good awesome.

item.title: Wow.
item.author: invalid@example.com (iansnyder)
item.dc:creator: iansnyder
item.content:encoded:
I just stumbled across this site, and all I have to say is WOW. I really hope you guys can find a publishing deal, because this game has so much more potential going for it than most other games that I have seen recently.

This is the first game I have seen for a long time that has made me get goose-bumps from looking at it It isn't that the graphics are great (which they are), but it is because I can see that there is so much creativity behind it. I am really excited, and this is...

Wow.

item.title: demo with gameplay?
item.author: invalid@example.com (judgedee)
item.dc:creator: judgedee
item.content:encoded: Great looking stuff, but I may be a little confused. I got the "eon foundation utm alpha v0.1" demo,58.2 mb. It's a nice map, with a soldier to play as, but nothing else. Are there supposed to be any beasts in this demo? Or any kind of combat? I'm trying to play as a single player- is this multiplayer only? Thanks, I will be watching out for progress on your project.

item.title: First Impressions
item.author: invalid@example.com (wyrmling_x)
item.dc:creator: wyrmling_x
item.content:encoded:
I'll admit, since I saw the first screenshots of Eon, I've needed to play it. Finally, I downloaded the pre-alpha, and I must say that I'm impressed.

The overall graphical feel is very good, and I love the style and design of the characters/races. The world displayed in the test level is lush, and will make for some excellent gaming. The feel of walking around as some monstrous Shepherd is truly great, as is hurtling across the map as the swift Shrike.

I do have a few minor quibbles,...

First Impressions

item.title: Flood
item.author: invalid@example.com (Samurai)
item.dc:creator: Samurai
item.content:encoded:
HELO

There's been a bit of a disaster at the Corona Leonis offices. The ground water has backed up during a rainstorm and our whole studio has started to flood. Huge wet patches started showing up through the carpets last night, and despite our best efforts, its getting worse. After talking to the experts it looks like we're going to have to tear up all the carpet in here and replace it after the mystery of the flooding itself is solved.

We stuck a huge sucking machine (seriously! it...

Flood

just wondering how you guys were going. did you guys manage to get an entry in for phase 4? i havent been able to idle in irc since i arrived in my new home :'( the firewall wont allow it...

anyway look forward to hearing some news

<3 from the sack

item.title: hey, got some questions about moding
item.author: invalid@example.com (Oback)
item.dc:creator: Oback
item.content:encoded:
hey, i would really like to get into moding and making games and what not. I have been a hardcore gamer for years now, and im a junior in high school. i plan on going into game design as my job. I will be going to college for game design. What programs should i start getting familiar with? what classes should i take that would help me? i Think the Coronaleonis mod looks fantastic, and you guys/gals are doing a great job. id just like some advice from some people that know what their doing....

hey, got some questions about moding

item.title: You guys should make a feature like.....
item.author: invalid@example.com (xover88)
item.dc:creator: xover88
item.content:encoded:
When a monster catches a player, camera don't automatically change to third person mode, you stay in first person camera mode, so you look like you are actually grabbed by a monster.

Or when a player falls on a ground when a animal(some antler kind of thing) gets scared and stands up like this screenshot
Make the FP camera look like you are actually falling.

I saw this similar feature in DOOM3, and Medal of Honor. In doom...

You guys should make a feature like.....
